## GetAuthState type

Gets authentication state for a request. Returned by `auth` interceptor.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type GetAuthState = <T = unknown>(request: KibanaRequest | LegacyRequest) => {
    status: AuthStatus;
    state: T;
};
```
